definition: to seal/to close up a package with a seal
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]
to confer/to grant/to bestow a title/to seal/classifier for sealed objects, esp. letters

sentences.english: The covering of leather, cloth, or other material being then affixed to the boards.
sentences.chinese: 然後裱上包封用的皮，布或其他材料。

sentences.english: High pressure extruding action has disadvantage on the encapsulation efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 高壓擠壓工藝不利於得到較高包封率的熊果苷脂質體。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the encapsulation efficiency and the release rate of baicalin liposome.
sentences.chinese: 目的測定黃芩苷脂質體的包封率與滲漏率。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo prepare and determine the content and entrapment efficiency of Hydroquinone liposome.
sentences.chinese: 目的製備氫醌脂質體並測定含量及包封率。

sentences.english: Microencapsulation is widely used in food industry.
sentences.chinese: 微包封目前已廣泛應用於食品工業上。

sentences.english: A process is provided for releasably encapsulating a biological entity.
sentences.chinese: 本發明提供了可釋放地包封生物學實體的方法。

sentences.english: Using insulin as the model drug, the encapsulation capability and sustained release of the nanoparticles were studied.
sentences.chinese: 以胰島素爲模型藥物，研究納米粒的包封和釋藥性能。

sentences.english: Special industrial sewing machine , bag closing machine.
sentences.chinese: 特種工業縫紉機，封包封袋設備。

sentences.english: The drug incorporation efficiency was affected in a narrow range by the conditions.
sentences.chinese: 不同製備條件對微球藥物包封率的影響程度較小。
膠塊用聚乙烯薄膜包封。

sentences.english: Preferably, the vinylpyridine polymer encapsulates the titanium zeolite.
sentences.chinese: 優選乙烯基吡啶聚合物膠囊包封鈦沸石。

sentences.english: Objective To prepare a harmine hydrochloride liposome formulation with high encapsulation efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 目的製備高包封率的鹽酸去氫駱駝蓬鹼脂質體。

sentences.english: Coated and encapsulated with epoxide resin, and unilateral lead-out.
sentences.chinese: 環氧樹脂浸塗包封，單向引出。

sentences.english: Tests showed that the drug-loaded mircospheres had good spherical shape but low drug-loaded rate.
sentences.chinese: 包藥後，成球性能好，但包封率和載藥率都不太高。

sentences.english: The morphology, diameter, and the encapsulation rate of the new particle were examined.
sentences.chinese: 觀察其形態，分析其粒徑，計算其包封率。

sentences.english: A safe delivery system of agriculturally active material is formed using an encapsulation process.
sentences.chinese: 使用包封方法形成農學活性物質的安全遞送系統。

definition: to close up/to heal (of wound)/to keep one's lips sealed
